txt.en:
[placeholder],

A matter has come to my attention that could use the care and discretion that we burglars employ. There is also an opportunity for you to learn something by undertaking this request.

If you are interested, bring this letter to me at the training hall at the Mud-gate in Bree.

Albra
'I'm glad to see that you received the note that I sent you. I think that this is something that will help you greatly.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to her. Apparently, there is something that she wishes to teach you.
Bring the note to Albra Lowbanks in Bree
Albra Lowbanks sent you a letter requesting that you visit her in the training hall in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Albra. She can be found in the training hall for burglars beneath the Mud-gate.
